title: incremental ICE: panicked while loading `has_ffi_unwind_calls` from disk

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code Error when running `cargo run program.me`. See https://github.com/EricLBuehler/merlin for the code. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.68.2 (9eb3afe9e 2023-03-27) binary: rustc commit-hash: 9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0 commit-date: 2023-03-27 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.68.2 LLVM version: 15.0.6 ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling merlin v0.1.0 (/home/ericbuehler/merlin/merlin) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'attempted to read from stolen value: rustc_middle::mir::Body', compiler/rustc_mir_transform/src/ffi_unwind_calls.rs:50:78 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fa4c409959a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::ha271a8a7e1f3d4ef at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7fa4c409959a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::h85739da0352c791a at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x7fa4c409959a - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt::hbc6ebcfb2910b329 at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:65:5 3: 0x7fa4c409959a - ::fmt::he1c117e52d53614f at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:44:22 4: 0x7fa4c40fb39e - core::fmt::write::h25eb51b9526b8e0c at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/core/src/fmt/mod.rs:1213:17 5: 0x7fa4c4089be5 - std::io::Write::write_fmt::ha9edec5fb1621933 at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/std/src/io/mod.rs:1682:15 6: 0x7fa4c4099365 - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print::hf8657cd429fc3452 at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:47:5 7: 0x7fa4c4099365 - std::sys_common::backtrace::print::h41b9b18ed86f86bd at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:34:9 8: 0x7fa4c409c12f - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::h22a91871f4454152 at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/std/src/panicking.rs:267:22 9: 0x7fa4c409be6b - std::panicking::default_hook::h21ddc36de0cd4ae7 at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/std/src/panicking.rs:286:9 10: 0x7fa4c73ec324 - rustc_driver[70f63b52fde826b7]::DEFAULT_HOOK::{closure#0}::{closure#0} 11: 0x7fa4c409c96a - as core::ops::function::Fn>::call::h6f7e3c94ecc52e2f at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:2002:9 12: 0x7fa4c409c96a - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::h5059419d6d59b3d0 at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/std/src/panicking.rs:692:13 13: 0x7fa4c409c6e9 - std::panicking::begin_panic_handler::{{closure}}::h0f383c291cd78343 at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/std/src/panicking.rs:579:13 14: 0x7fa4c4099a4c - std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_end_short_backtrace::h70ab22f2ad318cdd at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:137:18 15: 0x7fa4c409c3f2 - rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/std/src/panicking.rs:575:5 16: 0x7fa4c40f7d43 - core::panicking::panic_fmt::hd1d46bcde3c61d72 at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/core/src/panicking.rs:64:14 17: 0x7fa4c62eb5d5 - rustc_mir_transform[2d65a293f14beadb]::ffi_unwind_calls::has_ffi_unwind_calls 18: 0x7fa4c7c733f4 - ::with_deps::::{closure#1}, bool> 19: 0x7fa4c62e8885 - rustc_query_system[59807289ca97d521]::query::plumbing::try_load_from_disk_and_cache_in_memory:: 20: 0x7fa4c62e7b5c - rustc_query_system[59807289ca97d521]::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 21: 0x7fa4c6daa021 - ::has_ffi_unwind_calls 22: 0x7fa4c61333c9 - >::execute_query 23: 0x7fa4c6bd43de - >::exec_cache_promotions:: 24: 0x7fa4c6bd41e8 - ::drop_serialized_data 25: 0x7fa4c66a34db - rustc_data_structures[560608da72c35763]::sync::join:: 26: 0x7fa4c65cc340 - ::with_deps:: 27: 0x7fa4c65cc0ea - ::time::<(), ::enter, rustc_errors[53e74ce803854a4d]::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}> 28: 0x7fa4c65cac1d - rustc_span[7c23fb27ec020b97]::with_source_map::, rustc_interface[698bad460dbd68d3]::interface::run_compiler, rustc_driver[70f63b52fde826b7]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}> 29: 0x7fa4c65c32d4 - >::set::, rustc_driver[70f63b52fde826b7]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core[1d432356d8e1e9f1]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[53e74ce803854a4d]::ErrorGuaranteed>> 30: 0x7fa4c65c29d2 - std[f8b79e573431a86c]::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::, rustc_driver[70f63b52fde826b7]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core[1d432356d8e1e9f1]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[53e74ce803854a4d]::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core[1d432356d8e1e9f1]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[53e74ce803854a4d]::ErrorGuaranteed>> 31: 0x7fa4c65c277a - <::spawn_unchecked_, rustc_driver[70f63b52fde826b7]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core[1d432356d8e1e9f1]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[53e74ce803854a4d]::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core[1d432356d8e1e9f1]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[53e74ce803854a4d]::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#1} as core[1d432356d8e1e9f1]::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once::{shim:vtable#0} 32: 0x7fa4c40a6823 - as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once::h3205ec2d7fc232c5 at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1988:9 33: 0x7fa4c40a6823 - as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once::h3bb5daec8177f56b at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1988:9 34: 0x7fa4c40a6823 - std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::had7b8061e306bb5c at /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/library/std/src/sys/unix/thread.rs:108:17 35: 0x7fa4c3deeb43 - 36: 0x7fa4c3e80a00 - 37: 0x0 - error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.68.2 (9eb3afe9e 2023-03-27) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type bin -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental=[REDACTED] note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [has_ffi_unwind_calls] checking if `lexer::::clone` contains FFI-unwind calls end of query stack error: could not compile `merlin` ```
Backtrace

Backtrace is not available as the error **vanished** after running `cargo clean`. The error is not occuring any more, and so I cannot run with `RUST_BACKTRACE` and therefore unfortunately cannot provide the backtrace.

I was in an airplane at the time and suspect that this error was caused by a bit flip corrupting the Rust cache in `targets`, which is removed after `cargo clean`.
